description: Retrieves information about a resource policy. This operation can be called only from the organization's management account or by a member account that is a delegated administrator.

nested_items.name: ResourcePolicy
nested_items.description: A structure that contains details about the resource policy.

nested_items.name: ResourcePolicySummary
nested_items.description: A structure that contains resource policy ID and Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier (ID) of the resource policy.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource policy.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The policy text of the resource policy.
